statements: SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT complainant_name, accused_name, complainant_gender, accused_gender FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE accused_gender = 'Female';
SELECT complainant_name, accused_name, complaint_date FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE complainant_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY complaint_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY complaint_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT complainant_name, complainant_gender, accused_name, investigation_status FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY complainant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints WHERE accused_gender = 'Female' AND complaint_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY complaint_date ASC, complainant_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT complainant_gender, COUNT(complainant_gender) AS gender_count FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints GROUP BY complainant_gender HAVING gender_count > 1;
SELECT complainant_name, accused_name, DATEDIFF(NOW(), complaint_date) AS days_since_complaint FROM GenderDiscriminationComplaints ORDER BY days_since_complaint DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, complaint_date, description FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Billing';
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date, complaint_type, description FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, complaint_date, description FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT complaint_type FROM complaints;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Service'
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC
SELECT * FROM complaints JOIN investigations ON complaints.complaint_id = investigations.complaint_id WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT description FROM complaints WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100
SELECT complainant_name, investigation_date FROM complaints JOIN investigations ON complaints.complaint_id = investigations.complaint_id WHERE investigation_id = 3
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date FROM complaints WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM investigations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT complainant_name, description FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT investigator_name, outcome FROM investigations WHERE investigation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date FROM complaints WHERE description LIKE '%violence%';
SELECT complainant_name, start_date, end_date FROM complaints JOIN investigations ON complaints.complaint_id = investigations.complaint_id WHERE outcome = 'Closed';
SELECT DISTINCT investigator_name, enforcement_agency FROM investigations JOIN enforcement ON investigations.investigation_id = enforcement.investigation_id WHERE fine_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY complainant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complainant_name, category, status FROM complaints WHERE status='open';
SELECT investigator_id, investigator_name, department FROM investigators ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, description FROM complaints WHERE category='HR' ORDER BY complaint_id ASC;

SELECT complaints.complaint_id, complaints.complainant_name, complaints.status, resolution.outcome FROM complaints INNER JOIN resolution ON complaints.complaint_id = resolution.complaint_id WHERE complaints.status='resolved';
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, category FROM complaints ORDER BY category ASC;

SELECT c.complaint_id, c.complainant_name, i.investigator_name, a.assignment_date FROM complaints c JOIN complaints_assignment a ON c.complaint_id = a.complaint_id JOIN investigators i ON a.investigator_id = i.investigator_id WHERE c.status='Open';
SELECT r.resolution_id, c.complainant_name, r.resolution_date, r.outcome FROM resolution r JOIN complaints c ON r.complaint_id = c.complaint_id ORDER BY r.resolution_date DESC;
SELECT c.complaint_id, c.complainant_name, a.assignment_date, a.completion_date FROM complaints c LEFT JOIN complaints_assignment a ON c.complaint_id = a.complaint_id WHERE a.investigator_id IS NULL;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date, complaint_description FROM DiscriminationComplaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_date, findings FROM InvestigationDetails ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM ComplaintCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Discrimination%';
SELECT investigator_name, department FROM Investigators ORDER BY investigator_name ASC;
SELECT complaint_id, evidence_type FROM ComplaintEvidence WHERE validity_status = 'Invalid';
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationComplaints;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date, complaint_description FROM DiscriminationComplaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT investigator_name, findings FROM InvestigationDetails WHERE resolution_status = 'Open' ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
SELECT investigator_name, department FROM Investigators WHERE department = 'Human Resources';
SELECT category_name, description FROM ComplaintCategories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
